titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on 1, 1, 2-2-Tetrafluoroethene, oxidized, polymerized.
To extend the temporary suspension of duty on 1, 1, 2-2-Tetrafluoroethene, oxidized, polymerized.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 1, 1, 2-2-Tetrafluoroethene, oxidized, polymerized.
